# tcpwatch-app-v0.2.12

## Improvements

- **Settings page redesign** — proper two-column layout (API + Network on the left, Binaries on the right) replacing the cramped 6-column grid
- **Config file viewer** — collapsible section at the bottom of Settings showing the config file path and its JSON content
- **Documentation updates** — README, USER_GUIDE, and CLAUDE.md updated to reflect the new Settings page, config.json, and default snaplen change
